When I feel like sharing setup between tests, I usually have a design 
problem that deserves attention. If I give in and write the one-time 
setup, I miss the chance to improve my design.

Kent
--- In junit@y..., "Kelso, JP Phil (5502)" <kelsojp@r...> wrote:
> If you mean only run one setUp() for your entire test suite and 
only one
> tearDown() afterwards, look in the faq doc:
> 
> junit3.7\doc\faq\faq.htm
> 
> Otherwise look in the cookstour doc:
> 
> junit3.7\doc\cookstour\cookstour.htm
> 
> phil
>

> >   How do I run setup method only once for all the test methods 
inside the
